text:
@JoeBiden #Biden2020

If Trump is re-elected, we're screwed. He considers himself a "wartime president" when he has never visited a hospital to praise and thank the frontline workers who fight COVID-19 and send well wishes to the patients during this pandemic! Not once!! #Biden2020
